title: Enhancing Business Strategy Practical Competencies: Cloud-Based Mathematical Content Production and Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can create three types of content visualizing mathematical problem-solving processes using cloud-based collaboration tools (e.g., Google Workspace, Notion).
Learners can provide at least two specific feedbacks on peers’ mathematical content and improve their own content based on this feedback.
Learners can lead one or more real-time collaborative problem-solving sessions using peers’ math problems uploaded to cloud storage.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
